questions.question: The greater the surface area of the packing of the fractionating column,

answers.a: Efficiency doesn't depends on the surface area of the column
answers.b: The faster the distillation will proceed

explanations.a: Incorrect. Efficiency is directly related to surface area.
explanations.b: Incorrect. Speed depends on heat rate, not surface area.
explanations.c: Incorrect. Greater surface area improves separation, not lowers it.
explanations.d: Correct. More surface area improves the efficiency by allowing better separation.

questions.question: When the vapour pressure of a liquid equals atm pressure, the temperature of the liquid equals:

explanations.a: Partially correct, but the precise term is 'boiling point'.
explanations.b: Correct only at 1 atm; 'boiling point' is more general.
explanations.c: Only true for water at 1 atm.
explanations.d: Correct. Boiling occurs when vapour pressure equals atmospheric pressure.
